_header: He that made both heaven and hell
_description: The Childe of Bristowe — 558 lines in 12-line stanzas

BLHar2382.First Lines:
HE that made bothe heuene and helleman & woman in dayes
                    vij…
BLHar2382.Last Lines:
…and all the worlde in dayes seuenegraunte vs alle his
                    grace
BLHar2382.Note:
scribe wrote ‘amen’ to right and below last line (f.
                    127).
BLHar2382.Attributed Title:
The child of Bristow (f. 119, by scribe in upper margin); Child of Bristow
                    (ff. 120-127); Explicit the Tale of the Childe of Bristow (f. 127, by scribe
                    after end of text)
